results.title: Ovarian tumor-initiating cells display a flexible metabolism.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Tics</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020323 @@@TICs@@@ have an increased survival rate under limiting conditions as well as an increased survival rate when treated with @CHEMICAL_AICA_ribonucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031143 @@@AICAR@@@, but exhibit a higher sensitivity to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ than @CELLLINE_CVCL:UW70 @@@MOSE-E@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:UW70 @@@MOSE-L@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Anderson AS, Roberts PC, Frisard MI, Hulver MW, Schmelz EM. Ovarian tumor-initiating cells display a flexible metabolism. Exp Cell Res. 2014 Oct 15;328(1):44-57. PMID: 25172556
